long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PreDiscover is an extension that automates criminal background record searches in select counties in the state of Georgia. Users can upload an excel spreadsheet of searches (from DigitalDelve) that they wish to perform on a courthouse's search website, and PreDiscover will automatically run each search and return the results for each search. Searches that would normally take up to hours to complete can be completed in minutes, sometimes even just seconds, without the need for manual searching. Both "Match Existence" and "Full Data" versions are now available!

Currently supported GA counties (26): 
BURKE
CANDLER
CHATHAM
CHATTAHOOCHEE
CLARKE
CRAWFORD
DEKALB
DODGE
DOUGLAS
FAYETTE
FLOYD
FRANKLIN
FULTON
GRADY
GWINNETT
HABERSHAM
HART
JACKSON
LEE
MILLER
MORGAN
MUSCOGEE
PICKENS
TAYLOR
TROUP
WHITFIELD
